title: sukha kara
sahitya:
sukhakara sOmasundara kumara shubhakaram aruL amaravara



anupallavi



ihapara sukhadAyaka guha sUra nAyaka jaga rakSaka mAl manOhara



caraNam



mAtu malar tirumangalp-porkkalai mAdoDum paNi manOnmaNi akhila
dhAtuvardhani sadkavi kunjaradAsa vardhani angayarkkaNi maruvum
